name: Build a body
description:
This game was made to give me experience in using Unity to show to potential employers. I challenged myself to build this game from scratch - with the exception of unity default scripts and so on, I created all of the assets myself, including music, voice acting, scripting, design and animation. This was my first time using Unity, and as such I would really appreciate any and all feedback.

Controls: WASD/arrow keys to move, Look left/right - Q/E, look up/down - I/O, space to jump (if you can)
